summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Cashbook / Company Finance Module. All 24 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend testing verified all UI elements, Add Invoice functionality, Lock/Unlock Month, View Mode toggle, and Reports page integration.
critical_code_review_comments: All Cashbook API endpoints working correctly with proper validation
Month lock/unlock functionality prevents edits when locked
Summary cards correctly calculate totals from amount_received (not invoice_amount)
Export endpoints return proper CSV/ZIP files
seed_data_creation: Test data created and cleaned up during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Cashbook module fully tested. Backend APIs: Cash In CRUD, Cash Out CRUD, Categories, Month Locks, Summary, Exports (CSV/ZIP). Frontend: All UI elements present with data-testid attributes, Add Invoice dialog works, Lock/Unlock Month works, View Mode toggle (Monthly/Yearly) works, Reports page has Cashbook Report and Invoice Report options.

frontend_ui.summary_cards: PASS - Total Cash In, Total Cash Out, Net Profit/Loss displayed
frontend_ui.month_year_filter: PASS - Month and Year selectors working
frontend_ui.view_mode_toggle: PASS - Monthly/Yearly toggle working, month selector hidden in yearly view
frontend_ui.lock_unlock_month: PASS - Lock/Unlock buttons work, warning message shown when locked
frontend_ui.cash_in_tab: PASS - Add Invoice button, invoice table with all columns
frontend_ui.add_invoice_dialog: PASS - Client Name, Invoice Number, Date, Amount, Status, PDF upload, Notes fields
frontend_ui.cash_out_tab: PASS - Add Category button, Add Expense button visible
frontend_ui.add_expense_dialog: PASS - Category dropdown, Date, Description, Amount, Notes fields
frontend_ui.export_buttons: PASS - Export Cashbook CSV, Export Invoices CSV, Download Invoice PDFs ZIP
frontend_ui.reports_page: PASS - Cashbook Report and Invoice Report options with Download CSV buttons
